alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:44AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT RAPIDES...NORTHWESTERN EVANGELINE...EASTERN VERNON AND NORTHEASTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 615 AM CST... At 544 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clifton to near Pitkin. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Glenmora, Boyce, Cheneyville, Elizabeth, Alexandria International Airport, Hineston, Lena, Pitkin, Ball, Lecompte, Tioga, Timber Trails, Esler Regional Airport, Flatwoods, Otis, Elmer, Kingsville, and Sieper. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
